content.rendered:
Below is a table listing all the locations of every Zygarde Cell in Pokémon Unbound, along with a screenshot depicting exactly where you can find each one. You can also click each screenshot to see a full-size version.

Zygarde Cell Locations
Cell Location Screenshot
Zygarde Cell
#001 		Frozen Heights
Behind your neighbor’s house
Zygarde Cell #002 Route 1
Southwest of the frozen lake, along the main path
Zygarde Cell

East side of town, behind the fence
